name: df-sate
body: |- wceq(csate, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cfv(cfv(co(cv(s0), csat, cin(cep, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0)))), com), cv(s1))))
comment: A simplified version of the satisfaction predicate, using the standard membership relation and eliminating the extra variable ` n ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2013.)
